title: My Lady the Housemaid
description: Henrietta Wilson is a housemaid who is tired of being treated as if she's less then human, so when she unexpectedly comes into some money, she conceives a plan to live for a season masquerading as a society lady. But a chance meeting in her morning walks complicates matters.John Talbot was born into a baronetcy, but is forced by circumstance to earn his living as a servant. Carrying his father's shame, he deals with his fall from grace by isolating himself. Both shame and pride prevent him from accepting love, but he can't get a certain young lady out of his mind.Two people living a lie - can God bring them back to the truth - and to each other?This is a clean romance novella of around 41000 words. Contains religious themes. Content warning for passing mention of sexual assault and child loss in first chapter.
author: Abigail Blanchart
